name: Gods Mouth
description:
Gods Mouth is based loosely on the creepy pasta of the same name and also on the movie As Above So Below. 

Warning: Contains flashing lights and potentially disturbing imagery; please enjoy.

The players flashlight may  randomly fail during each playthrough and may or may not come back. Play in a dark room and take your time; the game can be disorienting especially when the flashlight fails. 

Despite them having been closed to the public after numerous disappearances, you are drawn to explore the mysterious set of caverns and tunnels called God's Mouth in the remote mountains of Vermont.   You want to see for yourself what waits within. 

WASD to move, space to jump. Press Q at any time to quit the game.
